subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * Note that regional variations exist for the upper left component of this character ({{l|mul|戸}} in Japan, {{l|mul|戶}} in Taiwan, Korea, {{l|mul|户}} in China, Hong Kong and Vietnam). In the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}, the component is written {{l|mul|戸}} similar to the Japanese form. * An alternative form {{l|mul|啟}} (U+555F) exists which is the preferred form used in Hong Kong and Taiwan.

subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[啟]]}} ''(Character used in Hong Kong and Taiwan)''
* {{l|mul|[[启]]}} ''({{w|Simplified Chinese}})''
